# scene Demos

## Layered Scene

Scene with overlapping foreground and background layers.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "scene_pal", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000FF", "{g}": "#00FF00FF", "{b}": "#0000FFFF", "{y}": "#FFFF00FF", "{c}": "#00FFFFFF", "{m}": "#FF00FFFF", "{w}": "#FFFFFFFF", "{k}": "#000000FF"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "tree", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [1, 0, 2, 2]}, "k": {"rect": [1, 2, 2, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sun", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"y": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "cloud", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"w": {"rect": [0, 1, 4, 2]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "grass", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"g": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "sky", "palette": "scene_pal", "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"c": {"rect": [0, 0, 4, 4]}}}
{"type": "composition", "name": "simple_scene", "size": [12, 8], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {".": null, "S": "sun", "C": "cloud", "T": "tree", "G": "grass", "K": "sky"}, "layers": [{"name": "sky", "map": ["KKK", "KKK"]}, {"name": "ground", "map": ["...", "GGG"]}, {"name": "objects", "map": ["S.C", ".T."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "layered_scene", "size": [8, 8], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {".": null, "T": "tree", "G": "grass", "K": "sky"}, "layers": [{"name": "background", "map": ["KK", "GG"]}, {"name": "foreground", "map": ["..", "T."]}]}
{"type": "composition", "name": "tile_grid", "size": [12, 12], "cell_size": [4, 4], "sprites": {"G": "grass", "T": "tree"}, "layers": [{"map": ["GGG", "GTG", "GGG"]}]}
```
